Articles.Content:
KSP is great because it showed me the delicate dance of speed and angle needed to reach other worlds, it taught me to orbit, and showed me that tiny changes can have huge effects.

What makes KSP great for you?

Getting your first ship to orbit, sending Jeb through the atmosphere with reentry effect laughing maniacally,

Or landing on the mun (or munar arch )

Landing on Laythe,

Or just messing around...

I'm going to study aerospace engineering!

This game literally changed my life.

...because it's just one of those sandboxes, where you really can do whatever you want (With the parts you're given.). Some of the sandboxes I've played, I was limited to a point where it almost wasn't a sandbox.

And the satisfaction.

KSP is great because it's the closest i will ever get to feeling how an astronaut might feel, it's great because it made me interested in a subject i never previously gave much thought to, only to wonder afterward how it was possible i had let such passions and dreams pass me by, it's great because in Kerbals themselves i see so much that is good about us humans, inventiveness, comradeship, cheerfulness, and bravery in the face of danger and solitude, and it's great because of the incredible awe i feel when i see the universe every time i get up there among the stars, to feel small is not always to feel bad, in Kerbal i found it to be illuminating and emotional.

I'm going to study aerospace engineering!

This game literally changed my life.

Me tooo! It's taught me so much about orbital mechanics and reawakened my love for space!
Because it will keep my mind sharp and my imagination active all summer!
Because it changed my life, How I thought about things, About physics. This is truly, The Best game I've ever played.
Because it's space and science. Two of the greatest things ever.

KSP is great because it will introduce a new generation to space travel and the wonders it can bring so public support will greatly increase for space travel. Hopefully we will be able to all go into space in a few decades thanks to this game. Thank you Squad.

Edited May 7, 2013 by LeonG17
KSP is one of the space games I have been looking for half my life; Designing and flying your own rockets in a realistic environment. I have long-awaited this, and I will always love it.
It taught me all different kinds of knowledge about space:wink:

KSP is great because

... it made me really enjoy computer game playing again, something that I haven't done for a while (other than Minecraft).

... it made me realise what true heroes these astronauts are.

... it game me an inkling of how difficult landing on the moon must have been.

... it made me feel guilty for sending little computer pixellated funny Kerbal guys to many pointless deaths.

... it got me off Minecraft.

... I am still playing it!!
KSP is great because it gives me my own solar system to play with.
Completely designing sleek spaceships from the ground up, then the trial and error of figuring out what may look cool, but doesn't actually work!
Because there is no killing in it.
... it allows me to give free reign to my creativity and dream up ever more elaborate contraptions.

Me tooo! It's taught me so much about orbital mechanics and reawakened my love for space!

Heh, I'll add myself onto this too

... because after playing it for almost a year, it's still so freaking hard. I can come up with projects that take days or weeks to finish, and it takes skill and perseverance to see them through. I don't just shoot 75 badguys and then progress to the next level, where I shoot 75 more badguys.

...because it is not a game as much as it is a simulation. The entire process makes you think about what you are going to do next, not just point and click. It is a great start and look forward to seeing what they bring out next.
KSP is great because...it is KSP. All I got to say.

Its great because it gave me even more respect for the real astronauts and the things they did/still do. If its hard to land even simply FLY a rocket to the Moon in this realistic yet "easier" (Than IRL, anyway,) space game, I can only imagine how ridiculous it was back then. Plus its the greatest thing to plan out some elaborate mission and when you finally lean back and think "Freaking success." Best game ever

KSP is great because of the developers. They don't give into people yelling at them. They have hard jobs developing this game and dealing with bugs and hacker etc. We should stop complaining about stuff and let them do what they do. Sure, post suggestions, but don't yell at them because of a little pixel is missing from the inner part of Jool. Sure, you can submit bug reports, but don't get mad when someone says something you don't agree with. The fourms are the best fourms I have seen in a while, and I assume it takes long to make sure everyone is happy. Don't complain about little things and think about the big things they are doing. That is all I have to say.
